page.title: 14Young Farmers' Club
page.content:
{Rusland Young Farmers}raise money for charities like the St. John's Ambulance Brigade. Usually they meet once a week in the Parish Room. They hold a concert each year at{Grizedale {Theatre}which raises about 300 pounds or more; they also have whist drives a few times a year and discos and mystery trips too. There is a tea afternoon for the OAPs which is well attended.
Once a year the Young Farmers have a field day when there are competitions like running, building walls, flower arranging, football, stock judging and sheep shearing. There are points for each competition; afterwards these are added up and there is a shield for the winner.
